attributes.review: Not only did this app take 40 days to download, it erased everything on my microwave settings. Very dissatisfied with the outcome as I can no longer enjoy microwaving oranges any longer. If I could give 0/5 stars, I would.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Worst app I have ever downloaded, full of false information and content that is vey questionable. I see this big orange man just talkin about nothing. Took serveral days to download. Overall terrible president
attributes.title: Stay away from this

attributes.review: This app took HOURS to download, and after it downloaded it hacked my entire phone  including all my social media accounts. I cant recover anything this app destroyed and it's also super hard to delete.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!! 🤮😤

attributes.review: Most useless app I’ve ever downloaded. Seriously what’s the point of making this an app? I didn’t see any improvement in anyway! If I could rate it 0 star I would
attributes.title: Why is this even an app?

attributes.review: Absolute garbage fire. I am severely disappointed by this. I thought maybe this would be helpful to see what the platform is and instead I found nazi propaganda. I am appalled.
attributes.title: I wish I could give it no stars

attributes.review: when i tried to download the app, it took several days then when it got on it wiped my phone of my credit and debit card and then it sent trumps staff to my house, they body slammed me and then proceeded to drag me through the mud after they were finished with me they yanked my grandma off of life support and tried to force her to hurt me, before they left they made me make them food or they would burn down my home🧍🏿‍♀️
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: i had to download this app for pERsOnAl reasons🙈😘.. but in doing so it ended up traumatizing my phone, although not as much as trump has traumatized every breathing thing on this planet that isn’t a cis white male. I would rate this app a negative if I could😘🥰
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD🤢🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this app after 20 weeks and when I tried to open it my phone stopped working and when I turned it back on the song fire by BTS kept playing and it did not stop.👁👄👁
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: This is such a horrible app. It is useless and doesn’t help at all. It glitches really bad. Also i am sure it takes my personal information so i feel like it should be banned😪🧚🏽🦋🤚🏽.
attributes.title: trump app review

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to support the president and Murica and next thing I know my phone is locked saying I have to donate all of my savings to the Trump campaign or they are going to cancel Rick and Morty! Do not download 🤬🤬🤬don’t let the Cheeto win!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD🤯😒
